_instructions.overview: REPLACE ALL __PLACEHOLDER_*__ VALUES WITH YOUR PROJECT'S BUILD/TEST COMMANDS AND ERROR PATTERNS.
_instructions.resultsPath: Path to test results. Can be a single file or glob pattern (e.g., 'target/surefire-reports/TEST-*.xml'). Glob patterns enable multi-file mode.

errorPattern.file_mode: Regex pattern to match and extract test failures. Use named capture groups: (?<testName>...), (?<testClass>...), (?<message>...), (?<file>...), (?<line>...)
errorPattern.glob_mode: Simple pattern for presence checking (e.g., '<failure'). Script counts occurrences and returns filenames with failure counts.
